website_summaries.verdict: A solid option at about half the cost of some others on the market.
pros: Users say this product helps teeth feel healthier and has a good mix of oils
It also stands out for helping to freshen breath
cons: Some say that it takes getting used to
needs to be shaken well before use

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price but keep the mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a beginner’s oil pulling formula that works wonders after the first(or third) time round. Like the instructions say: do NOT spit in the sink. The oil hardens when it’s hot at the risk of clogging your drain. When pulling and swishing after a few seconds you can feel residue or food come out that you might not have fully flossed out the night before. That’s IF you floss. Don’t throw out your Listerine though: it’s best to take it in tandem with an antiseptic mouthwash to make sure you have all the crevices in your mouth covered.
customer_reviews.author: jevon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Results!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother suggested I buy this product as he uses it and raves about it's efficacy. Well he is right!! My teeth seem to stay whiter and my gums look healthy. My only complaint is that I didn't listen to my brother sooner and buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Keakulina

customer_reviews.title: NO emergency room for me!
customer_reviews.text: In the bottle it says to not swallow. If it is swallowed, you have to visit the emergency room. Um, that’s a red flag. Thanks for the heads up, but I will kit be using this. Organic, extra virgin coconut oil is proven to kill 100% of the bacteria in the mouth. At least if I accidentally swallow this, I won’t have to go to the emergency room. This is a no-go.
customer_reviews.author: Beautifulgirl

customer_reviews.title: Used a few times.
customer_reviews.text: While my final verdict is still out, in just a few uses, I can already see a difference in the health of my gums. I've been having a ton of issues with my gums for the past few years, and a friend who experienced gum issues following multiple pregnancies told me about oil pulling and washes. I figured I had nothing to lose, and so far it seems to be making a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: Stopped brushing my teeth about 6 months ago and use this twice at day. Went to my cleaning and the dentist said he had never seen cleaner teeth
customer_reviews.author: Casius Monet

customer_reviews.title: love this, don't taste bad either
customer_reviews.text: my mouth has been thanking me for using this daily! I need to reorder. i almost think it is helping a spot on my tooth that has discoloring or drawing of my gum from my bridge!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best new thing I have purchased this year. I will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Been using this for a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Been using this for a few days now and notice a big difference with my sensitivity. Would highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: NLG

customer_reviews.title: It works and taste great
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with thrush due to illness. I researched and found that oil pulling was a solution. Purchased this product and after 1 use I saw a major difference. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: aprettyblackwoman

customer_reviews.title: Makes the mouth happy
customer_reviews.text: My family member who has sensitive teeth is trying out this oil pulling product as a dental rinse and likes it enough that he’s stuck with it for several weeks, which may be a record for him. He likes it better than mouthwash and is using it in place of that, though I don’t know if it’s intended to serve as a complete replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Good in theory, taste is terrible but not as bad as straight oil by itself. The more liquid consistency does make it more difficult not to swallow, which is a major thing to avoid. I wanted to love it but it turns out I have allergic skin reactions to coconut oil, and I don’t think it did my tongue any favors either.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me At All
customer_reviews.text: I love the benefits from coconut pulling. However, I saw this at Whole Foods and thought I would give it a try. Not only does it taste awful you cannot get the oil out of your mouth or your lips. I feel like I was putting vegetable oil in my mouth. This was a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I was amazed at the improvement in ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I was amazed at the improvement in the health of my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get this product, spend a little lite and get a more natural chemical free product it will work better than this not worth it to save money you will lose more money in the long run and the bottle is super annoying hard to put the cap back on
customer_reviews.author: vinay chodha

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Developed sores on my gums because this dried out my mouth so much...
customer_reviews.author: // kc

customer_reviews.title: Better than mouthwash, but that's it.
customer_reviews.text: A little more fulfilling than mouthwash, but not going to work a miracle overnight. Definitely going to take years of use to see real changes.
customer_reviews.author: Black Light Org

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Really interesting product. Thought Zi would try oil pulling after a friend mentioned it. Really makes my teeth and mouth feel clean. I barely swished for three minutes can’t imagine doing it for 20! Overall, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesecake

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure yet, it's kinda early. I only ordered it the day. I'm hoping itll cure a cavity. If I see other better results I ll rewrite
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit pricey since I use it twice a day
customer_reviews.text: I still keep buying the product. Just wish it comes in a bigger bottle. Tastes good and keeps your gum healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Sandburg

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Strange taste. Not cocunut oil I dont think. 3/4 oil, the rest Im not sure. You see the separation of the two consistencies in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this product so far. Mint is not too distinct.
customer_reviews.author: Ally B.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: gave as a gift - seems to work as mentioned. great job
customer_reviews.author: Cachi

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work if you have tooth sensitivity do not purchase this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!! No need for dentist :)
customer_reviews.text: I buy this at the health store. Was lazy to drive there. Works great!!! I avoid dentists like the plague so this is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Raita-Princess

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of teeth pain and this really helps.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smooth feeling in the mouth
customer_reviews.text: Love how this product makes my mouth feel after use... And love the minty flavor as well..
customer_reviews.author: Chris Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A great product for oil pulling. Even kids like it
customer_reviews.author: lisa gentry

customer_reviews.title: Fresh taste and fresher mouth
customer_reviews.text: Tastes *very faintly* lemony. Not gross at all. Pretty easy to use, and my mouth feels healthy and fresher through the day.
customer_reviews.author: kitten

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and has ingredients that are good for teeth! Just have to make sure you shake it because it separates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, bottle cap didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The taste and consistency of the oil was good. The bottle cap did not screw onto the bottle well. Therefore, the oil would leak out.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I see feel the difference it has made , very pleased and satisfied, will order this product again very soon don’t wanna run out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lula Mccray

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the taste. I use it twice a day morning and before bed at night.
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel this product really helps to clean my teeth. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So I just started oil pulling and I have to admit I tried it today for the first time and I was very satisfied. I did it for about 5 minutes and my mouth felt clean and not dry at all like all these listerine mouth washes do. I will continue to use and post results after a month.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo v.

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of acidity  mouth ulcers right away!
customer_reviews.text: I have given this product as a gift as it really works. My tongue is especially sensitive when I have too much acid in my diet. Ex. tomatoes, salsa, chili, over salted food, etc. I also bite the inside of my mouth as I talk in my sleep! This is a fabulous product that works within 24 hours!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Mold in the top
customer_reviews.text: Opened the bottle and there was mold growing all over the cap. Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good but ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This does taste a lot better than typical oils I have used for pulling, but that's where it ends. It does not change in viscosity or color when used, which tells me it is not pulling anything. Additionally my teeth and gums have not improved. I have used olive, safflower, sunflower and coconut for pulling and have always seen improvements. Back to those.
customer_reviews.author: bonliv

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely buy this one if your gums blood a lot , it help me with my morning breath too. At first you will spit it right away but after days you will most likely to keep it inside for 10 min. I just bought it like a week ago and I’m using it since then and my gums improve a lot . I’m satisfied with my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Me teeth brighter!
customer_reviews.text: My sister told about coconut pulling. When I came across this coconut dual phase pulling and wow! I saw a difference in the brightness of my teeth in two days. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff takes some getting used to, but I can definitely tell a difference. It moistures my mouth more than regular mouthwash. The taste is okay too.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely buy again. Tastes great. Does well for pulling inflammation from teeth/gums.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great pulling rinse
customer_reviews.text: I love this pulling rinse! I stays liquid while sitting so you don't have to deal with solid chunks of coconut oil. It also has a nice flavor. My teeth and gums are nice and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Meadow

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought Coconut oil!
customer_reviews.text: The taste was too sweet. and it did not last long. I am going back to the extra virgin Coconut oil-it is more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: EAbston58

customer_reviews.title: Our and Natursl is the Best
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the whitening but my teeth are all healed up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Desert essence mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: This mouth wash is the best it truly works as it should .and also have a good taste .try it.
customer_reviews.author: studmuffinjr

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: It's ok I don't care for the taste. I like the sesame seed oil I got previously
customer_reviews.author: jenny rabalais

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I actually had some teeth sensitivity and mild pain. Using this every morning consistently for 3 days completely stopped that irritability.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried it for a month...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on itsjudyslife. I finished the bottle. I oil pulled for (20mins) twice a day after brushing. It did help with morning breath but it didnt do much for her and it didnt do much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pango

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this once in a while, but when I do, it leaves my breath very fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This pulling rinse worked great for my sensitive tooth. The discomfort is gone! It really works! I use it every night and morning, I love it. I just wish it was bigger😊
customer_reviews.author: Petrona

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: use only a little, takes getting used to. SHAKE WELL!!!!!, has not whitened my teeth at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice pulling rinse
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. It is a nice pulling rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Roberge

product_meta.title: Coconut Oil Dual Phase Pulling Rinse - 8 fl oz
feature_bullets: Reduces plaque buildup - organic mouth rinse brightens your smile and promotes removal of plaque from teeth, help preventing tooth decay.
Removes impurities - the goodness of organic virgin coconut, sesame and sunflower oils helps remove impurities from your mouth.
Freshens up mouth - desert essence mouth rinse contains australian tea tree oil, wintergreen oil and spearmint oils that provide a cooling sensation to your mouth and leave a refreshing smell.
Safe for regular use - pulling treatment mouthwash does not contain alcohol, sugar, fluoride, and gmo, which makes it safe for everyday mouth cleaning.
Inspired by ancient practice - coconut oil mouth rinse is inspired by the ancient ayurvedic practice of oil-pulling to support teeth and gums.
